summary: ENGINE BEGAN IDLING ROUGH, ENGINE LIGHT CAME ON ON THURSDAY, JUNE 22, 2017. FRIDAY AND SATURDAY, JUNE 23 AND 24, 2017, ENGINE CONTINUED TO DRIVE ROUGH (CHUGGING). SATURDAY, JUNE 24, 2017 AT 12:15PM, WHILE ON THE HIGHWAY-. DRIVING STRAIGHT ON A COUNTRY ROAD, ATTEMPTING TO ACCELERATE UP A HILL, THE RPMS INCREASED BUT WITH NO MOVEMENT IN SPEED, THEN IN THE MIDDLE OF NOWHERE-THE ENGINE LOST ALL POWER. HAD TO PULL OFF THE ROAD. AT 2:20PM, PLACED A CALL FOR ROADSIDE ASSISTANCE TO GET VEHICLE TOWED.
